name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Healing Potion
description: A magical potion that restores health.
looks: The healing potion is a small glass bottle filled with a vibrant blue liquid.

name: Staff of Frost
description: A staff that harnesses the power of ice.
looks: The staff is made of shimmering crystal and has intricate ice formations along its length. The top of the staff is adorned with a large blue gemstone that glows with a cold light.

special_effects.chilling_touch: Attacks have a chance to freeze the target, slowing them down.

name: Dagger of Shadows
description: A deadly dagger that grants its wielder the power to move unseen.
looks: The dagger is made of a dark, shimmering metal that seems to absorb light. The handle is wrapped in black leather for a comfortable grip.

special_effects.shadowstep: Allows the wielder to teleport short distances

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Enchanted Staff
description: A magical staff infused with powerful enchantments.
looks: The staff is made of polished mahogany and adorned with intricate gold carvings. It glows with a soft blue light.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the power of spells by 20%.

name: Staff of the Arcane
description: A staff imbued with powerful arcane energy.
looks: The staff has a long wooden shaft adorned with glowing runes. At the top, a crystal orb hovers and crackles with energy.

special_effects.spell_power_increase: Increases the power of spells cast by the wielder.

name: Elven Bow
description: A beautiful bow crafted by skilled elven archers.
looks: The bow is made from a rare and sturdy wood, intricately carved with elven symbols. The string is made of woven silk and glows with a faint magical aura.

special_effects.swift_draw: Allows for faster drawing and firing of arrows.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A staff that harnesses the power of the elements.
looks: The staff is made of a polished dark wood and adorned with intricate engravings of elemental symbols. It glows softly with a pulsating energy.

special_weapon_skills.Elemental Mastery: Increases damage of elemental spells by 20%.

special_effects.Elemental Infusion: Adds additional elemental damage to spells and attacks.
